description.value:
The Arrow represents the journey; the travels needed to reach a destination, through all factors of life. The Arrow's Spine is prickly and pointed, where danger is seen everywhere, and paranoia is abound. Such are the perils of the journey.

Constellation @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.deities.Item.bQJ4eQKF50ofQdGr]{The Arrow}

First Asterism (Level 4): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.JLo2gJ2s0BXUKsLQ]{Attune} action, but you cannot manifest solar manifestations with this action and can only Attune in combat, losing your attunement once danger has passed. Unless you have another means of defining it, you are considered to have the Balanced arrangement. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.ynPBYXVBqiuIvc0D]{Stellar Rush} feat.

Second Asterism (Level 8): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.j7qOAjGFBpw9CBH5]{Flicker Strike} feat.

Third Asterism (Level 12): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.feats.Item.cIebNIFzeTEsNIUN]{Gravity Ripple} feat.
